entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
